InputHasntValue: Insert a code in the field
soldedItemInCart: Sold out products are not eligible
minCartAmount: Insufficient cart amount for this code
maxCartAmount: Cart amount exceeds the allowed amount
validCoupon: The coupon code has been added
singleCouponOnly: This code is not cumulative, remove the other promo code(s)
singleCouponUsed: You have already entered a non-cumulative coupon code
warningNoMoreAvailableCoupon: you can't use another coupon, field disabled
groupNotValid: your account does not have the required privileges for this coupon
noAvaillableProduct: You have not ordered the product that matches this coupon
unhautorizedProduct: You have an ineligible product in your cart
availableCatInCart: You do not have a product of the category in your cart
excludedCatInCart: You have an ineligible category in your cart
soldedProduct: The product is currently sold out, coupon not valid
